artist: Painter: After Lorenzo Sabbatini; Artist: Francesco Rosaspina
description: Virgin seated on a cloud being lifted to heaven by angels; surrounded by chior of angels with harp and lute
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

on sheet below image in black: Lorenzo Sabattini dip.  F. Rosaspina sis. e inc. / B.V. ASSUNTA IN CIELO CON GLORIA D\'ANGELI | on sheet in pencil: 2-347
title: Blessed Virgin Assends Into Heaven
